alert.note: Alert for Benton; Linn (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 23 at 11:40PM CDT until July 24 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 AM CDT FOR BUCHANAN...BENTON AND NORTHWESTERN LINN COUNTIES... At 1140 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Oelwein to near Keystone, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Independence, Vinton, Robins, Jesup, Center Point, Urbana, Dysart, Fairbank, Palo, Shellsburg, Winthrop, Hazleton, Walker, Van Horne, Alburnett, Keystone, Quasqueton, Lamont, Garrison and Brandon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
